{{Enemy Intro}}

One [[Local Legend]] Wind Operative, '''Deianeira of Snezhevna''', can be found in the Hidden Lab, [[Morte Region]] after completing the [[World Quest]] ''[[An Expected Lie]]''.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Fakeout
|desc_1      = Raises a barrier in front of herself. If attacked from the front while the barrier is active, the DMG dealt will be nullified and the Operative will teleport to the player's location and strike down with her cane, dealing '''70% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.
* The strike down can also be triggered if the Wind Operative is attacked multiple times.
* '''Veteran/Local Legend''': Will not raise the barrier unless approached during '''Galeshot'''. A '''Spikefield''' will spawn immediately following the strike down.
|caption_1   = Normal
|file_1_2    = Wind Operative Local Legend Fakeout
|caption_1_2 = Veteran/Local Legend

|name_2      = Spikefield
|desc_2      = Marks an area around the player and deals '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}} in that area.
* '''Veteran/Local Legend''': This will be used 3 times in quick succession.

|name_3      = Galeshot
|desc_3      = Consecutively fires 1, 1, and 2 wind orbs at the player. Each orbs deals '''50% ATK''' in the first 2 waves and '''60% ATK''' in the final wave respectively as {{Color|Anemo DMG}} on hit. If the player gets too close during the first shot, the Wind Operative will follow up with '''Spikefield'''.
* '''Veteran/Local Legend''': Fires 3, 3, and 5 wind orbs instead. If the player gets too close during the attack, will use '''Fakeout''' instead of '''Spikefield'''.
|caption_3   = Normal
|file_3_2    = Wind Operative Local Legend Galeshot
|caption_3_2 = Veteran/Local Legend

|name_4      = Hunt Down
|desc_4      = Sacrifices 5% of her Max [[HP]] (or 25% of current HP if HP percentage is under 20%) to initiate Hunt Down: Locks onto the player, teleports her cane above the player which then strikes down, dealing '''90% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}. If the first hit connects, the cane will then release a wind blast, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.
* If the player is hit by the first hit of this attack, they will receive a [[Life Bond]] equal to '''16%''' of the Operative's ATK.
** As long as this Life Bond is active, they will also be affected by a [[Corrosion]] status which drains '''0.4% Max HP + 72''' every second.
*** If the affected character is off-field, they cannot be brought below '''5% Max HP''' by this Corrosion. However, on-field characters can die to it.
** If the Hunt Down attack hits a character affected by this Life Bond, it will deal '''250%''' of its original DMG.
** This Life Bond is stackable.
** This Life Bond lasts for 10 minutes if not cleared.
* '''Veteran/Local Legend''': The follow-up wind blast will always occur regardless of whether the first hit lands.
}}

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Wind Operative}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|An elite agent among the Fatui.<br>"Operatives" have no ordinary military rank among the Fatui. Based on their orders and the content of their missions, they can work in concert with other soldiers, work alone, or in tandem with the "tacks" hidden and scattered across the world. They spy, conduct counter-espionage, protect, assassinate, and conduct other tasks. In order to effectively carry out missions of a more special nature, "Operatives" also need to master all kinds of other skills and even various arts and talents.|[[Archive]]}}
